learn_with_passion: Learn with passion to live with purpose.
What_we_do_desc:
The biggest advantage of Gecko is the 24/7 availability of teachers. Students can choose their convenient time and day for classes. Another advantage is that the classes are trilingual: students can choose which language they want to learn: Armenian, English or Russian.
Our students can always take one free trial class before joining the main classes.
Who_we_are_desc: Both teachers and students of Gekko are located in different parts of the world: Armenia, USA, Europe, China, Canada, Dubai, Russia, Thailand. This creates a unique connection between our students and teachers in different parts of the world, thus making the educational process more global.
How_it_work_desc: The choice of teachers is perhaps the most important and cornerstone issue in "Gekko Education". All teachers undergo training and a probationary period. Based on teacher evaluations and parents' opinions, teachers receive points, and only teachers with the best scores continue to work in the team.
Upcoming_Education_Events_to_feed_your_b: Upcoming Education Events to feed your brain.
How_real_people_said_about_Education_Wor: How real people said about Education WordPress Theme
contact1_description: 1800 Abbot Kinney Blvd. Unit D & E Venice
tutors1_desc: Лорем Ипсум — это просто текст-заполнитель в типографии и печатной индустрии. Лорем Ипсум был стандартным текстом-заполнителем с 1500-х годов, когда неизвестный печатник взял набор букв и перемешал их, чтобы создать образец текста.
